releaseNotes:
Welcome to the official Paris 2024 Olympics app. 

Whether you're in Paris or watching from home, this app has all the information you need to experience the Olympic and Paralympic Games Paris 2024. In this new app, we have reinvented the user experience to bring you closer to the Games than ever before. In the new app you can find: 
 
- Brand new homepage. Designed to highlight everything about Paris 2024.  
- My Events. Manage your ticketed sessions and enhance your spectator experience.
- The competition schedule to help you prepare for your Games. 
- A Torch Relay section to closely follow the relay route throughout France and overseas. 
- The Games Map shows you all the events related to the games nearby you. Celebration, cultural events, national team houses, and fanzones; you will always know where to be. 

We hope you enjoy this new version. Please share your feedback on: https://support.olympics.com
description:
Welcome to the Paris 2024 Olympics app, your personal companion for the Games.  

Olympics: 26 July - 11 August 2024  
Paralympics: 28 August - 8 September 2024  

Get up-to-the-second medal results, customisable schedule, the full range of spectator experiences, including the Games Map and ticket holder information, breaking news of all your favourite athletes and behind-the-scenes access. The Paris 2024 Olympics app is your go-to resource for the Olympic and Paralympic Games.  

Here are the main features you will find in the official app:  

• BREAKING NEWS: Get minute-by-minute updates on all your favourite events. Receive customised push notifications by adding all your favourite Olympic and Paralympic events, teams and athletes.  
• GET EXCLUSIVE ACCESS: Discover in-depth insights into Olympic and Paralympic events and qualifiers.  
• CUSTOMISE YOUR EXPERIENCE: Add all your favourite Olympic and Paralympic sports and teams for a personalised experience. 

CUSTOMISABLE SCHEDULE
 
Never miss a moment! Create a customised schedule, follow your favorite Olympic sports, teams and athletes.

REAL-TIME MEDAL COUNT

Follow the games even more closely with the medal table. Track your favourites so you're always up-to-date.

OLYMPIC TORCH RELAY 

Follow the Olympic and Paralympic Torch Relay on its way to the Paris 2024 Opening Ceremonies throughout all the magnificent territories in France and overseas.   

GAMES MAP 

Want to experience the Games outside the competition venues? The Games Map shows you all the events near to you. Celebrations, cultural events, national team houses and fanzones; you will always know where to be. As we approach Paris 2024, exciting updates will be added to the map. Check back often to unlock the ultimate Games experience. 

MY EVENTS

Sign in with the same email you used to connect to Paris 2024 Tickets for a seamless spectator experience. Unlock the My Events feature to gain access to a dedicated section for all your ticketed sessions. Manage everything in one place, view key information, explore features, and plan your schedule for each event, ensuring a smooth and unforgettable Paris 2024 experience. For entry into the venues, download the Paris 2024 Tickets app to access your digital tickets

PLAY 

Put your knowledge to the test with the Allianz trivia game and get ready for Paris 2024. Join fans from around the world to share your excitement about Paris 2024 and cheer on the best athletes in the world together! Share your photos, videos and messages on social media tagging @Olympics #Paris2024 
  
OLYMPIC SHOP 

Get access to the Olympic Shop, the one-stop destination for all your Olympic and Paris 2024 merchandise. From T-shirts and hoodies to pins and mascot plush toys, you will find everything you need to get closer to the Games.  

The app content is available in English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Hindi, Korean, Russian, German, Portuguese and Spanish. Please refer to our terms and condition and privacy policy for additional terms.
